mapper.update:
update t_user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_no = #{mobileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
idno = #{idno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_no = #{mobileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, idno = #{idno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
